strings.Value: "The only thing that seems to have left you is your mind!"
"Whatever the others did to you, we're each responsible for our own crimes."
"I don't believe the soul can be irreparably damaged. Perhaps not all is lost for you after all."

"I told them to stop! No, I told them to search... It is pointless. Why do I need this?" {n}Nyrissa turns to you.{/n} "Do you see now? Do you see? They ripped my heart out and threw it into your world! And something else was torn out with it..."
"No, no... Something deeper... brighter, I suppose. I only know the sound of this word, but not its meaning. A burning word. A stupid word. 'Love.'"

"Something that was stolen from me. Do you believe the aim of my curse was the destruction of your pathetic kingdoms? No, that was merely a path toward redemption. The curse... it deprived me of a part of my soul. The most important part. Ripped from me â€” crippled, mutilated, and turned into an artifact. Briar." {n}The nymph nearly spits the last word out with seeming hatred.{/n}
"Do you enjoy watching my agony? Allow me to see yours in return!"
{n}Your words resound with an unexpectedly loud echo. Seemingly influenced by them, the surrounding world begins to change...{/n}
